an3.131:1.3: Mātugāmo, bhikkhave, paṭicchanno āvahati, no vivaṭo;
an3.131:1.4: brāhmaṇānaṁ, bhikkhave, mantā paṭicchannā āvahanti, no vivaṭā;
an3.131:1.5: micchādiṭṭhi, bhikkhave, paṭicchannā āvahati, no vivaṭā.
an3.131:1.6: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi paṭicchannāni āvahanti, no vivaṭāni.
an3.131:2.1: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, vivaṭāni virocanti, no paṭicchannāni.
an3.131:2.3: Candamaṇḍalaṁ, bhikkhave, vivaṭaṁ virocati, no paṭicchannaṁ;
an3.131:2.4: sūriyamaṇḍalaṁ, bhikkhave, vivaṭaṁ virocati, no paṭicchannaṁ;
an3.131:2.5: tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo, bhikkhave, vivaṭo virocati, no paṭicchanno.
an3.131:2.6: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi vivaṭāni virocanti, no paṭicchannānī”ti.
